# Long Unbroken Content

## Very Long Word

Supercalifragilisticexpialidociouseventhoughthesoundofitissomethingquiteatrociousifyousayitloudenoughyoullalwayssoundprecocious

## Long URL

Check out https://example.com/this/is/a/very/long/path/that/goes/on/and/on/and/on/without/any/breaks/whatsoever/until/it/finally/ends/here.html

## Long Code

```
ThisIsAVeryLongVariableNameThatSomeoneWroteWithoutAnyUnderscoresOrCamelCaseJustOneGiantWordThatKeepsGoingAndGoing
```

## Long In List

- ThisIsAnExtremelyLongListItemWithoutAnySpacesThatJustKeepsGoingAndGoingWithoutStoppingForAnything
- Normal item for contrast

## Long In Bold

**ThisIsVeryLongBoldTextWithNoSpacesAtAllJustOneGiantBoldWordThatSpansTheEntireLine**

## Long Header

## ThisIsAVeryLongHeaderWithNoSpacesThatTestsHowTheParserHandlesExtremeleLongUnbrokenHeaderText

## Long Link Text

[ThisIsAnExtremelyLongLinkTextWithoutAnySpacesThatJustKeepsGoingAndGoing](https://example.com)

## Long In Quote

> ThisIsAVeryLongQuotedTextWithNoSpacesAtAllJustContinuousCharactersThatGoOnForever

## Mixed Long Content

Start with normal text then **VeryLongBoldWithNoSpaces** then `VeryLongCodeWithNoSpaces` and back to normal.

## Numbers and Letters Mixed

abc123def456ghi789jkl012mno345pqr678stu901vwx234yz0
